    Methods in camzup.core with parameters of type Edge2 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static boolean Edge2.areNeighbors​(Edge2 a, Edge2 b)
    Evaluates whether two edges are complements or neighbors, i.e., whether one edge's origin is the other's destination.
    int Edge2.compareTo​(Edge2 edge)
    Compares two edges based on their identity hash codes.
    static float Edge2.dist​(Edge2 a, Vec2 b)
    Finds the distance between an edge and a point.
    static Vec2 Edge2.eval​(Edge2 edge, float step, Vec2 target)
    Finds a point on the edge given a step in the range [0.0, 1.0] .
    Edge2 Face2.getEdge​(int i, Edge2 target)
    Gets an edge from this face.
    Edge2 Mesh2.getEdge​(int faceIdx, int edgeIdx, Edge2 target)
    Gets an edge from the mesh.
    static float Edge2.heading​(Edge2 edge)
    Finds the heading of an edge.
    static float Ray2.intersectEdge​(Ray2 ray, Edge2 edge)
    Finds an intersection between a ray and an edge.
    static float Edge2.mag​(Edge2 edge)
    Finds the Euclidean distance from the edge's origin coordinate to that of its destination.
    static float Edge2.magSq​(Edge2 edge)
    Finds the squared Euclidean distance from the edge's origin coordinate to that of its destination.
    static Vec2 Edge2.projectVector​(Edge2 edge, Vec2 v, Vec2 target)
    Projects a vector, representing a point, onto an edge.
    Face2 Face2.set​(Edge2... edges)
    Sets this face's vertices to refer to those in an array of edges.
    static int Edge2.sharedCoord​(Edge2 a, Edge2 b)
    Tests to see if two edges share a vertex coordinate: Returns -1 when a's origin is b's destination. Returns -2 when a's destination is b's destination Returns 1 when a's destination is b's origin. Returns 2 when a's origin is b's origin. Returns 0 when none of the above conditions are met. Assuming a mesh is properly wound, a value of 1 implies that two edges belong to the same face; of 2, different neighboring faces.
    Constructors in camzup.core with parameters of type Edge2 
    Constructor Description
    Face2​(Edge2... edges)
    Creates a face from an array of edges.
